title: Why Were You There?, from "The Amman Project"
marks: Signature, Date, Edition and Chop LRC, in pencil: [D. Heyman 2006]
description: line drawing-style portrait of a man with a large round face, moustache, small scruffy beard, smooth hair and long eyelashes; man wears jacket, shirt and tie; text on top, L and R edges
creditline: Gift of funds from Allen Brookins-Brown
